SEARCH
Package Controller

Class InventoryController

java.lang.Object
Controller.InventoryController
public class InventoryController extends Object
The InventoryController class is responsible for managing the inventory of medicines. This includes adding, removing, updating, and viewing inventory, as well as managing stock levels.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    InventoryController(AdministratorController administratorController)
    Constructs an InventoryController for an administrator.
    InventoryController(PharmacistController pharmacistController)
    Constructs an InventoryController for a pharmacist.
